title: Critical Crypto Security Warning: Your Seed Phrases Are at Risk
summary: FIP Crypto warns that common practices like screenshots, password managers, and hot wallets expose seed phrases to hackers. The note emphasizes that one mistake can lead to permanent loss of assets and on-chain footprint, highlighting critical security vulnerabilities in everyday crypto storage methods.

title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) Limitations in the Age of AI Agents
summary: Adeniyi.sui discusses the limitations of the Model Context Protocol (MCP) for AI agents. The post includes a video component and has garnered significant engagement with 16 likes and 4 comments, suggesting important technical insights for the AI and blockchain intersection.

title: Bitcoin Supply Shortage Analysis: Sellers Running Out
summary: Viktor posts a brief but potentially significant market analysis suggesting that Bitcoin sellers will run out of coins to sell. This supply-side perspective could indicate upcoming price movements or market dynamics shifts.
